DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct explore safety tolerability plasma pharmacokinetics NRL001 single intra-anal dose 1mL cream increase concentration .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Single Intra-anal Dose NRL001 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: IN.1 ) sex : male female ( nonchildbearing potential use medically adequate contraception IN.2 ) race : Caucasian IN.3 ) BW : 50 100 kg IN.4 ) BMI : 20 28 kg.m2 IN.5 ) age : 21 50 year IN.6 ) type : healthy basis specify criterion evaluate screen visit IN.7 ) willing able provide inform consent General EX.1 ) Previous participation trial EX.2 ) Participant trial last 90 day EX.3 ) Donation blood last 60 day history blood loss exceed 300 mL within last 3 month EX.4 ) History clinically relevant allergy ( include hypersensitivity trial medication ) EX.5 ) Presence acute chronic infection EX.6 ) Presence history relevant comorbidity EX.7 ) Resting systolic blood pressure > 140 < 90 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure > 95 < 50 mmHg EX.8 ) Clinically relevant ECGabnormalities , prolong QTc > 450 msec male > 460 msec female particular EX.9 ) Presence relevant abnormality laboratory safety test , especially low haemoglobin , increase liver enzymes EX.10 ) Positive serology HBsAg , anti HBc anti HCV EX.11 ) Positive HIV test EX.12 ) Positive alcohol urine drug test recruitment ( upon admission ) EX.13 ) History alcohol and/or drug abuse and/or daily use > 30 gr alcohol EX.14 ) Smoking 15 cigarettes/day equivalent tobacco product EX.15 ) Use prohibit medication EX.16 ) Suspicion evidence subject trustworthy reliable EX.17 ) Suspicion evidence subject able make free consent understand information regard General females EX.18 ) Positive pregnancy test EX.19 ) Lactating EX.20 ) Not use appropriate contraception premenopausal woman ( note : condition present study , woman use hormonal contraceptive inform method sufficient study i.e . mechanical method [ condom , diaphragm spermicidal gel ] use addition ) .
